name: Everend (Archrend)
description:
Everend is a turn-based roguelike card collection game.

Choose a starting story that fits your play style.

Traverse a unique hostile world in a 16x16 pixel art style and prove your worth.

Collect corrupted cards which add a unique twist to every playthrough. Be careful, however, as these types of card can also help your enemies too.

Do you have what it takes to be prove your judicators wrong?
